title: TypeTrust releases Heroic Condensed by Silas Dilworth
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20100625024239/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 13.May.2008 10.25pm 

Need a something more interesting than your standard ultra condensed sans? Check out [Heroic Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20100625024239/http:/www.typetrust.com/font/heroiccondensed) new from TypeTrust by Silas Dilworth! It is being billed as "the quintessential geometric sans" and is available in a range of 8 weights including obliques. It is on sale now for $160 or 50% off the individual weights.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100625024239im_/http:/typophile.com/files/heroic_6035.png)
author: Miss Tiffany
